title: 3 Way Decorator Paddle Light Switch, Electrical Rocker Light Switch, Single Pole or Three Way, 3 Wire, 15A 120V/277V, UL Listed, White (20 Pack)

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #12,035 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #48 in Electrical Light Switches       #48 in Electrical Light Switches

shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: High Quality : This 3-way rocker/paddle light switch has Durable construction made of high-quality, impact resistant polycarbonate thermoplastic and solid steel for extended service life
Modern Design : Easy break-off plaster ears provide the perfect fit in any application, and narrow switch body leaves more room behind walls. On/Off paddle rocker switches are easy to be controlled.
Easy Installation : Shallow body design fits standard junction boxes. Quick push-in and side wiring options available. Copper wire only. Break-off plaster ears. Grounding screw

Wide Range of Place : Suitable for residential use and most commercial areas that require only 15A switches. Such as homes, garages, sheds, or guest houses, offices, lobbies, hospitals, banks, hotels, restaurants, stores, shops, warehouses etc.
TAKETEK 1-year Warranty : 15A 120v-277v (ac only) 3-way rocker/paddle light switch. Comes with white wall plates,Wiring instructions included. UL Listed.

customers_say: Customers find these light switches to be of good quality and value for money, with positive feedback about their appearance and functionality. They are easy to install, and one customer mentions they replaced all standard switches throughout their home.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These work perfectly for around my house. A great addition to renovating a house that was billed before this style of switches. It gives my whole house a more modern look well not breaking the bank. It's also very easy to install, but if you have an older house like I do. Your wires may be a higher gauge then the socket in which case dreading the wires through the back will be a bit of a pain in the butt. What I recommend is you pretread once every socket through one wire as to shave off the little bit of plastic that's preventing a smooth entry. It was safe you a lot of hassle of having to undo the whole thing if you're using the quick insert. If you're using the side hooks then it's just a standard procedure.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat price and product
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: No complaints easy to install and worked great. Came with instructions and hardware needed to replace my light switches. Great value for your money.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Nice night light and mood light

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2025
Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2025

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLooking for a Contractor package for those Decorator Switches ... look no further these are perfect.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: My wife and I recently replaced our light switches in our bungalow and didn't want to pay lot. We went to various hardware stores and could not find a deal with more than 2. We were able to get all of light plates replaced while keeping the price down - Thanks!

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: We put these on all our rentals. It adds a modern look to the place.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: This is good quality and value , i like it
